content: Hi, I'm looking for a booking agent to help me with my trip to Tokyo. Can you recommend someone?
Of course! There are several excellent booking agents in Tokyo. Would you like me to suggest some top-rated agencies?
Yes, please. I'm looking for someone who can handle my corporate bookings and also provide good customer service.
I've got just the person for you! Agent Thompson is highly rated and has extensive experience in corporate travel. He's also very responsive to client needs.
Agent Thompson sounds great, but I'd like to see his portfolio first. Can you send me a link to his website or a sample report?
Actually, Agent Thompson didn't provide me with any recent reports or updates on his clients' travel plans.
